text: “Nayi, ɛ siga n ma yire fonni Silo taani n xinla yi binyama dɛnaxan singe yi.7.12 Filisitine bata yi Silo taan kala na waxatini. Ala Batu Bubun yi tixi mɛnna nin. Na feen sɛbɛxi Yosuwe 18.1 kui e nun Samuyɛli Singen 4.12-18 kui. Ɛ sa a to n naxan ligaxi a ra, lan n ma yamana fe ɲaxin ma, Isirayila kaane.
